mapper.select: select if(count(v.*) = 1, 1, 0) from valid_coupon v, owned_coupon o where v.coupon_id=o.coupon_id and o.coupon_id=#{coupon_id} and owner_id=#{owner_id} and available_count > 0
select v.*, o.available_count from valid_coupon v, owned_coupon o where v.coupon_id=o.coupon_id and o.owner_id=#{owner_id} and o.available_count > 0 and expiration_date > sysdate
select count(o.coupon_id) from owned_coupon o, valid_coupon v where owner_id=#{owner_id} and o.coupon_id=v.coupon_id and available_count > 0 and expiration_date > sysdate
